评论详情: Love this dress! Wore for photo shoot. Size is just right. It is a tad see through but no big deal. Material is as expected.

I eloped with my partner on Halloween and wanted a witchy black dress to fit the vibe. While I’m an elder emo year round, I’m not much of a dress girlie. This one may just convert me, though! It was SUPER comfy, VERY flattering around my insecurities (midsection and arms), and BEYOND affordable! The lace did require a little trimming here and there to take care of some minor fraying on the sleeves but it was no biggie. I lasted all day in this thing and can’t wait to wear it for future occasions like our belated family reception. And it showed up fabulous in the teasers we got from our photographer! Who would’ve thought I’d find The Dress(TM) for under $50 on Amazon? Not me lol. But boy am I glad I did! 🦇✨
Bought thinking I would wear to a Stevie concert, but material was a bit rough and itchy! Love the look though. I

This is cute, but I would say it's a tunic and not a dress.  I'm 5'5 and this barely covers my butt.  Would definitely have to wear it with leggings.  The material is pretty cheap feeling and none of the lace is hemmed so it catches on everything.  I normally wear a 2x and bought the 4x in this and there is not much room to spare
I was worried when I unpacked it thinking it was way to short. I'm a sz 18 - 5 ft 8 and have a 34 in inseam. This fits perfectly, and falls at my fingertips. I'll wear it with some tights.

评论概述: My daughter wore this to Stevie Nick's concert
评论详情: She looked beautiful! Fit a bit loose but other than that she loved it!

I got this dress for a coven themed bachelorette party. The style was perfect and it fit comfortably, but it was just too short for me. I easily could've worn leggings under it and it would've worked, but not for a 90 degree night. I ended up returning it.

评论概述: Lace sleeves rip easily, very short
评论详情: I would probably suggest sizing up? Purchased size I would normally get and sleeves are fine, but lace is extremely fragile. I have worn once and it's already ripped by the armpit. Dress comes to about mid-thigh, which I'm not a huge fan of. I out another layer under to make it seem a little longer.
Looks gorgeous!!!!
Has some stretch, I didn't even need to unzip the dress to put it on. Definitely short, but luckily so am I! Perfect dress by itself or dressed up with a belt or something!
I would have rated the dress higher if it was so short. The top and sleeves are great

评论概述: Live your best Stevie nicks life!
评论详情: I loved it! It’s slightly see through but other than that no complaints.

That is so beautiful 😍. I bought this last min to replace a dress that didn't look right on me. This is perfect. Dress fits amazing. It is so playful. Was a little shorter than expected, but with the way it fits idc.
Excited to wear! Would recommend. I ordered two sizes up and it fits well.
This dress is so cute and comfy. It has a good amount of stretch to it and the lace isn't itchy at all.

评论概述: Very flattering, be careful of the sleeves
评论详情: A bit short on me so I wore it more as a shirt and not a dress. But it is pretty and flattering. The only thing I wished is that the sleeves were hemmed to give it a more finished look. Otherwise a great buy!
Cute dress, comfortable and it has stretch..

Update: DO NOT WASH THIS DRESS IN WASHER WITH ANYYHING ELSE. ALONE ON DELICATE. Hubby accidently washed this with other clothes and it did not come out good. I love this dress so will def be buying another.  I've usually very uncomfortable in dresses and this one I didn't want to change out from it. It is a little short in the back but I expected that from the reviews so I made sure to wear tights or shorts underneath. But gorgeous dress and very very comfortable
This dress was everything I was wanting it to be!  My sister and I took photos in a cemetery and this dress was the perfect outfit!
Great dress for a school dance
The dress was perfect for the occasion comfortable and stretch material a little on the short side but other than that beautiful
Its a cute dress. But like all the other reviews it is way too short and i didnt see the reviews til after i had bought the dress.
Definitely runs short! And see through, but I had a long pencil skirt I put on under it for added length and not to be able see to through

This dress is super classy and cute, however, very short in length… very short! Pairing with black full coverage leggings and knee high boots will be a charm for a Halloween gothic party. Seems high quality and pleasantly surprised by the material and fabric of the dress. Wish it was about 6 inches longer (not exaggerating). Will be careful not to bend to pick something up for sure! Overall classy, and comfortable (except for length).

评论概述: So fun and soft to were
评论详情: Love it. Never had sleeves like this. Very soft and comphy.

It’s so cute and comfortable. Tons of compliments but the size is a bit to big for me. It’s also supposed to show off the girls a bit and the front just keeps going up. Slightly annoying but everything else is good
I really adored this dress, but it was crazy short. I tried styling it a couple ways and could not make it work. Had to send it back

This is really not as described at all. The hemming all throughout the dress is uneven and bunched in places. I ordered a small and it fits like a large. The length is really short. The dress comes right to the bottom of my butt. I’m 5’6. I really wanted to love this dress and took a chance. The only thing I Iike is how soft the lace is. Returned.
Fit like a glove! Except it was WAY too short
Love the style but it rode up. Wouldn't stay where it was supposed to sit. Aso lace wasn't hemmed so it would probably fray to pieces first wash or even before that
True to size. Fits my daughter perfectly and will be worn for her upcoming graduation party!!
Very cute but very short, fit well except length, and I'm not tall

This dress is beautiful! The material is light weight and slightly stretchy so it clings to your curves nicely. Because other reviews said to order up, I ordered a size 12 when I'm normally a 10. I expected the shoulders to be tight because I have wide shoulders but I did not realize it would be so tight across my chest too. I am a 38C and could barely get it zipped! But fortunately I managed to get it on and it looks lovely! The only real problem I have is the length of the dress. It barely covers my butt while standing! So, it's not much of a dress on me but more of a long shirt. However because it looks so nice and seems to be of good quality material, I don't mind.

I love this dress! I wore it for a witchy Halloween photoshoot. Runs a little short, but not so short where you have to worry about your butt showing. I’m 5’5” so if you’re my height or shorter you’ll be fine! Love the bell sleeves and lace. Gorgeous dress, perfect for Fall and Halloween.
The dress is lovely but it was not hemmed. It kinda snags on things but it's still a deal for the price
I bought this dress for my black wedding. Three times the charm. Got married in this dress yesterday. Felt beautiful in this dress.
Great dress! Beautiful fabric

I'm 5'2 140lbs very big busted( 36 DDD to G depending on bra). I ordered a 8-10 size because that is what I wear in dresses. Material is stretchy but it is very short ( i am sure it's my boobs fault) so i will def get leggings or shorts to go underneath. The material is soft,  stretches over my breast nicely, and thick  but not so thick I will die from heat( I'm in texas so that's a big deal). The sleeves are nice and delicate and go just at my fingertips.  I love it and my husband adores it! Def recommend. The product also arrived way sooner than expected!  Expected to arrive between dec10 and jan 4th, and I got It November 28th! I will def buy again for sure!  Great  material and value for the price

评论概述: My maid of honor loved it!
评论详情: I got this product for my maid of honor at my wedding to wear to match the black and white theme. It came perfect, and fit perfect as well! She looked beautiful in it, and it really made my wedding a success. I recommend this dress for anyone loving this style or for any occasion! The fit was really well and it was a very soft dress!!

评论概述: Super short, makes for a beautiful shirt
评论详情: Beautiful sleeves but wayyyyyy too short to ever be worn as a dress, not even a mini dress.
I’m 5’ 8” and this was soooo short. It’s perfect and beautiful and fit great, until I went to bend over. I loved it so I kept it and just wore shorts underneath.
It was super comfortable the only thing I noticed was that the sleeves were a little longer than i wanted. but just a little. Otherwise this dress is super cute and comfortable and im in love with it
Soft comfy perfect fit exactly what I wanted and I feel cute I adore this dress
It is most definitely sheer , but it’s cute !! I’m about 5’8 and it’s short but not super short ! It’s manageable , feels like something you’d get at forever 21 and I’m not mad at it lol!
Love this dress, a little thin material wise but super cute!
I purchased this dress for photos and when I put it on I was shocked at how short it was. I'm 5'9" and it literally did not even cover my butt. I do not recommend this dress if you're tall!
Very cute as a SHIRT. I'm only 5'5 (and curvy) and it doesn't even cover my entire butt. If I were to wear it as a dress and move,  even slightly, you'd be able to see everything.

Absolutely love this dress. Beautiful Victorian lace that is so very soft and very comfortable to wear. Very stunning. You can wear this for a nice dinner or wear it more gothic style for everyday or for Halloween. It’s a very versatile dress. All though, it is rather short and I am tall. But I wore completely black stockings with with it for full overage. I actually bought this awhile wand just wore it for the first time. I have lost weight and it bigger on me now, but it still looked good. I plan on purchasing another one in a smaller size. I am just in love with with it!
I’m obsessed with lace and bell sleeves and this dress has both! It fits like a glove and is super comfortable.

I love the sleeves on this dress! Normally I don’t wear sleeves because I do have larger arms, but I took a chance and it paid off.  At first I thought it was to to big, but everyone else said that It for perfectly!
Super cute! It is on the short side, I wore shorts underneath. I paired it with a belt and loved it. I definitely recommend.
Much shorter than I expected but very cute, will have to wear leggings underneath  :/

When I wore this for the first time I really did love it. But after one single wash the dress was a disaster. The stretchy lace fabric pilled and bunched up, and for some reason or another the dress hot a whole lot shorter even after washing in cold water. Cute dress, if you plan on wearing it once. Other than that kinda of a waste of money
Ordered this dress for my best friends wedding and it's just perfect ❤️ exactly what I wanted
Nice for the price.

Such a cute dress! I ordered to wear for a masquerade ball. A little stretchy, very comfortable. I had many compliments on how beautiful the lace sleeves were. Best part, I didn't need to do anything for wrinkles despite it being stuffed in a suitcase up until I put it on. It is a little shorter than I expected, but it covered enough and looked great.
Looks great and fits well.
This felt more like a tunic shirt since my ass was hanging out.
I loved the style and the fit. I noticed that there was an are where the netting had a whole. Because of the fullness of the skirt, it is not very noticeable. Decent enough for the price.
My daughter looks fabulous in this and she loves the sleeves. Great heavy lace.
This was better than expected!! I love it! I wear leggings underneath and it’s perfect!!
Really bad quality, not worth the money. Terrible rip off

I absolutely adore this dress ! It’s comfy and cosy and perfect for my Halloween costumes as well as Autumn time activities. And the sleeves !! The sleeves are so breathtaking, the lace , the shape , everything. Perfect length on me (5’6) sits on mid-low thighs and not too revealing . Pair of thick tights make them perfect for literally any autumn or winter event 🖤

A gorgeous dress with a stunning fit, but sadly I didn't note that it was hand wash only and it has shrunk in the wash! A few straggly lacey bits initially but easily trimmed, slightly on the short side but nothing thick tights or leggings can't cope with!  I'm just devastated that it's now a few inches too short to wear with tights anymore, definitely needs leggings now!
Loved this so much. It’s quite short but I wear it with leggings or jeans. I ordered it in red as loved it so much. It’s very flattering.
Excellent Halloween party

Absolutely love this dress! Loads of compliments. It is a little short and I am only 5ft 3 but I put tights on and looked fine (I think). Great quality and washes up well too. Fantastic for the price.
I love this dress. The main feature I like is the sleeves. There are not many dresses I have looked at that have flared sleeves. The fit was just perfect.
Amazing quality and perfect fit I love it!

I absolutely love it. A little short but nothing a pair of thick tights wont solve. I paired with a waist belt and some lace up ankle boots and its like a witchy dream. I feel stunning in it.
